metric.name: Daemon Threads
metric.description: Current number of live daemon threads in this VM.

metric.name: Loaded Classes
metric.description: Total number of classes loaded since vm started.

metric.name: Number of CPUs
metric.description: Number of cpus available to the java VM on its machine.

metric.name: File Descriptor Limit
metric.description: Maximum number of file descriptors

metric.name: Open File Descriptors
metric.description: Current number of open file descriptors

metric.name: Free Memory
metric.description: An approximation fo the total amount of memory currently available for future allocated objects, measured in bytes.

metric.name: Max Memory
metric.description: The maximum amount of memory that the VM will attempt to use, measured in bytes.

metric.name: Peak Threads
metric.description: High water mark of live threads in this VM.

metric.name: Pending Finalization
metric.description: Number of objects that are pending finalization in the java VM.

metric.name: Process Cpu Time
metric.description: CPU timed used by the process in nanoseconds.

metric.name: Thread Starts
metric.description: Total number of times a thread has been started since this vm started.

metric.name: Number of Threads
metric.description: Current number of live threads (both daemon and non-daemon) in this VM.

metric.name: Total Memory
metric.description: The total amount of memory currently available for current and future objects, measured in bytes.

metric.name: Unloaded Classes
metric.description: Total number of classes unloaded since vm started.

metric.name: Heap Committed Memory
metric.description: The amount of committed memory for this area, measured in bytes.

metric.name: Non-Heap Committed Memory
metric.description: The amount of committed memory for this area, measured in bytes.

metric.name: Code Cache Non-Heap Used Memory
metric.description: The estimated amount of used memory currently in use for this pool, measured in bytes.

metric.name: Eden Heap Used Memory
metric.description: The estimated amount of used memory currently in use for this pool, measured in bytes.

metric.name: Survivor Heap Used Memory
metric.description: The estimated amount of used memory currently in use for this pool, measured in bytes.

metric.name: Tenured Gen Heap Used Memory
metric.description: The estimated amount of used memory currently in use for this pool, measured in bytes.

metric.name: Perm Gen Non-Heap Used Memory
metric.description: The estimated amount of used memory currently in use for this pool, measured in bytes.

metric.name: Scavenge Collection Time
metric.description: Approximate elapsed time spent doing collections by this garbage collector.

metric.name: MarkSweep Collection Time
metric.description: Approximate elapsed time spent doing collections by this garbage collector.

metric.name: Scavenge Collections
metric.description: Total number of collections this garbage collector has done.

metric.name: MarkSweep Collections
metric.description: Total number of collections this garbage collector has done.

metric.name: Average Scavenge Collection Time
metric.description: Average collection time per collection.

metric.name: Average MarkSweep Collection Time
metric.description: Average collection time per collection.
